import React from 'react' import {useState} from 'react' import '../pages/style.css' import axios from 'axios' const Add = ({onConfirm, onClose, student_id, semester_id}) => { const [register, setRegister] = useState({ student_id: student_id, course_id: "ME1023", semester_id: semester_id, }) const handleChange = (e) =>{ setRegister(prev => ({...prev, [e.target.name]: e.target.value})) } const handleClick = async e => { e.preventDefault() try { await axios.post("http://localhost:8800/register", register) }catch(err){ alert(err.response.data.sqlMessage) } } return(

Đăng kí mới

) } export default Add
